0.post_text: Tomorrow, come to Cineleisure Orchard from 6pm to 8pm for the Grand Entrance of the Samurai Tamago! We’re giving away treats fit for any warrior ;)

comments.message: I ordered a Beef Samurai Tamago meal from your Lot 1 outlet today, and requested that it was made without lettuce. I have had many bad experiences with wrongly prepared orders at this outlet in the past, so when the order came I specifically asked the Floor Manager Mr Jhose to check to see if it was correct. He took a quick glance and packed it in a bag for me. When I got home I found that the burger was not only in a big sloppy mess but also that it did not contain an egg. I checked the receipt and confirmed that I did in fact order and pay for the burger with an egg. As I mentioned earlier, this is not the first time an incident like this has happened and it has left me very disappointed.
where the chicken samurai
Needless to say, I didn't even finish the burger. Look at how appetizing it is.

comments.message: Im sorry but the sunrise rolls are absolutely pitiful
the new side salad upgrade is nice indeed

Visited McD Ang Mo Kio Park last week with my family. I was extremely enlighten by your new menu theme. 

Went to the counter and seem so curious about your twilight meal. Your cheerful staff at the counter recommended me to have the fiest meal. The pricing was worth every penny. He was very patient to explain to me the content of the burger and also ask my preference. Indeed, it was very thoughtful gesture.

I chose the grand twilight burger. The burger ingredients was the prefect combination ever. It taste so delicious. The steak sauce complement the patty so well. I love the egg too. Feel like it's mcdonalds breakfast in evening.

The midnight delight was so rich with chocolate and it's the best match w your famous ice cream. Overall, my family and myself enjoyed our evening at that mcdonalds. It was a new experience for me at mcdonalds. Great food and excellent service really make my day. I would like to commend your customer service manager, Saiful for being patient and recommending me to the twilight meal.

Keep it up Mcdonalds!

Wth mcdonald's!! Raining n u can't take my order!!! If u can't take orders while it's raining, just close down!! I use to be a rider as well, I have delivered food when it's raining!! U choose to be 24/7 so don't give me this bullshit that ur riders can't ride when it's raining.. If hurricane I understand la.. But its not!! If u guys food come hot like pizza, we won't complain!! But ur food come cold cos ur rider or u choose to deliver 2-3 one time, which takes 15-20 mind depending on delivery.. which is unreasonable cos everyone is paying the same amount for delivery.. I rather u don't do delivery If u can't support delivery in wet weather.. coffee shops will be able to do delivery den.. cos of u guys, coffee shops don't have a chance and those who can must have a certain delivery charge cos of mcdonald's!! U better do something bout it!!

comments.message: Big & nice!
Sayonara Adios Goodbye McDonald's I'm with Burger King now...their meal matches their price and their coke float is awesome n generous.

Colleague and I each bought the Grilled and Spicy McWrap...no surprise on the similarities of the ingredients to the McSpicy and Grilled Chicken Salad, but the vegetables and meat portions of the 2 McWraps were sssoo different! 
Colleague's Grilled Chicken McWrap had so much veggie, while my Spicy McWrap had almost no veggie!
Worse, for an item which has been featured in other countries, werent the kitchen staff taught on how to WRAP? There was no "base" to the wrap, which resulted in our chicken and bveggies falling out; and the chicken being in 3 pieces didnt exactly help with the "enjoyment" of the meal...
All in all, as of now, I'd say KFC still wins with their wrap.
The mcwrap is A4 size. I tried n is gd. :)
The wrap has a funny weird taste n sticky.  The texture is limp n taste totally different from kfc bandito wrap..macs one looks like the supermarket gardenia brand/mission brand wraps...
Love the grilled chicken mcwrap..but must request with extra sauce.
i like! :D

Mac while the nacho cheese FoF is back, idk why the nacho sauce servings is very different. I and my friend bought the same nacho cheese FoF orders from the same outlet in the same day. The only difference is that I ordered without lettuce.

Now, the part where I am disappointed is when my friend showed me the amount of nacho cheese sauce he got. Why so selfish? On the other hand, mine got fully loaded with the sauce. Did they run out or what? Is ordering it with lettuce decreases the amount of nacho cheese in the burger?

Richman Kum
